summary: This character is based on Nordic Valkyrie mythology. I pulled from the late 19th and early 20th century pop art and imagery of the Valkyries. I modeled her face from Claudia Shiffer\'s face using her features within the limits of Vanilla\'s parts. She is located in the Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead.
descriptionHtml:
This character is based on Nordic Valkyrie mythology. I pulled from the late 19th and early 20th century pop art and imagery of the Valkyries for her overall look. I modeled her face from Claudia Shiffer\'s face using her features within the limits of Vanilla\'s parts. I also used Claudia\'s height and weight to round her out. She is sandboxed at the Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead.


She is a Calculated lvl 30 two handed combat boss and has perks that correspond with her mechanics. 
Her inventory consists of a steel two handed sword and no clothing or armor. 
She is approximately 5\'9\"-5\'10\" and 125-30 pounds
Custom hair and makeup coloring by me.
Voice: Even Toned - This voice is bugged, when she is not following you she will use the Throw Voice Shout at you. This is a Vanilla issue so there is nothing I can do about it other than change her voice. I am trying to diversify my characters and  do not want to keep using the same two voices over and over again so I\'m sticking with this voice for now. 

For her to appear as she does in my images use the following mods;
Bella\'s Better Faces with Makeup version 1 and CBBEv3 Curvy with Navetseas CBBEv3 body texture. Her eyes are light blue by Natural Eyes. 

Remodeled Armor CBBEv3 by MAK - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
NorseViking Chainmail by Croc - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13462
Nordic Spears by P3dr0 aka Issae - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15294
CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589
Better Females by Bella by BellaGail - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Expanded Jewelry Crafting by ArcaneSmith - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14304

You must download ApachiiSkyhair for this mod to work! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Thanks for trying her out and if you like her or my work endorsements are welcome and much appreciated! 

FB
author: FalmerBane
